name: Bob Boberson
story: Now here's a little story I got to tell About three bad brothers you know so well. It started way back in history With Ad Rock, MCA, and me, Mike D. Been had a little horsey named Paul Revere. Just me and my horsey and a quart of beer. Riding across the land, kicking up sand. Sheriff's posse's on my tail 'cause I'm in demand
goal: My life goal is to be more awesome than Chuck Norris.

updates.text: So stoked to participate in this program!
Ballin'. Got my new bank account!

name: Anita Mann
story: I was crazy once, they locked me in a rubber room, it was cold in that rubber room and cold makes me crazy. Crazy? I was crazy once, they locked me in a rubber room, it was cold in that rubber room and cold makes me crazy. Crazy? I was crazy once, they locked me in a rubber room, it was cold in that rubber room and cold makes me crazy.
goal: My life goal is to be a professional painting belly dancer.

updates.text: I got a gig belly dancing at a greek restaurant

name: Jack Mayoff
story: Here is my story, I was a like a monkey jumping on a bed, then I fell off and bumped my head. My mom called the dr and the dr said, no more monkeys jumping on the bed.
goal: My goal in life is to write a book about sewing.

updates.text: I'm so thankful for this program
My life is so much better now

name: Hugh Jass
story: I'm a little teapot, short and stout...here is my handle and here is my spout. When I get all warmed up hear and you hear me shout, tip me over and pour me out.
goal: My goal in life is to be a pilot.

updates.text: I got hired to be a private pilot for a corporation
Thanks to this program I am happier than ever

name: Sal Lami
story: I am happy, oh so happy. I am happy as happy can be.
goal: My goal in life is to be a salesman.

updates.text: I am the newest salesman at Toyota
I just got promoted to manager
